page.title: 07RELIGION,CHEADLE.
page.content: THERE ARE FOUR PLACES WHERE FAMILIES FROM OUR SCHOOL WORSHIP WITHIN GATLEY VILLAGE CHEADLE. TWO CHRISTIAN MEETING HALLS, ST. JAMES CHURCH OF ENGLAND AND THE UNITED REFORM CHURCH ON HAWTHORN ROAD. CHURCH GOING IS MORE POPULAR THAN WE THOUGHT WITH 56% ATTENDING CHURCH REGULARLY EITHER INSIDE THE VILLAGE OR OUT. AN EQUAL NUMBER OF PEOPLE WENT TO ST. JAMES AND THE UNITED REFORM CHURCHES. JUST TWO FAMILIES WORSHIPPED IN THE MEETING HALLS. ONE FAMILY WENT TO THE LOCAL MOSQUE, ANOTHER WENT TO THE NEAREST ARMENIAN CHURCH AND SOME VISITED THE SYNAGOGUE IN THE AREA TOO. JUST OVER 10% OF THE FAMILIES SURVEYED WENT OUTSIDE THE VILLAGE TO WORSHIP. 44% OF FAMILIES SAID THEY DID NOT ATTEND CHURCH.
